ground_truth: He casually pours out the Barbicide disinfectant and drops the glass container on the floor, then flips open a Zippo lighter and strikes it on his leg. Her mouth hangs open, and she points to the desk. At night, in Sandy's car, Diana smiles as she applies makeup. He faces forward with a stern gaze and shakes his head. As they enter a restaurant, a young red-haired waitress greets them, then walks away smiling. He signals the waitress, and she turns, shocked to see Sandy. She glares at Sandy and leaves as he looks upward. The waitress returns with a mound of food, and she pulls her thumb from Sandy's soup. As the waitress leaves, Diana takes a large bite of ribs. In a motel, they approach the front desk, and she leaves. Diana enters The Foxhole, where a husky bearded man in a cowboy hat notices her and nods to himself as Diana sips her green beverage. He turns away, and she notices his Mercedes car key and thick gold ring on his pinky. The man smiles, sits beside her, removes his hat, and extends a hand, wearing a turquoise bolo. They toast and down their shots. They sit at a table with several empty shot glasses, and as they drink another shot, Diana slaps the table. Sandy enters and scans the room, smiling as he approaches their table. She points at Chuck and places a hand on his shoulder. Big Chuck nods, and she leads him to the dance floor. Diana and Big Chuck shimmy, and with her eyes on Sandy, Diana pinches Chuck's nipples through his shirt. Spinning around, Diana bends over, and Big Chuck twirls his cowboy hat behind her like riding a bronco. She stands and they continue dancing with her eyes on Sandy, who motions toward the door. Facing Chuck, Diana shimmies in place and suddenly drops into a split with her face by his crotch. Big Chuck points finger guns at Sandy as Diana dances on the floor. They enter a motel room where Sandy sets down his wallet. Chuck walks into Diana's arms, and Big Chuck whips off his belt, swinging it up from his crotch like an elephant's trunk and hitting Sandy in the face. Chuck gives him a final belt slap, then drops it. He aims a finger gun at his crotch and unbuttons his pants, dropping them. She spanks Big Chuck as he rapidly knocks his knees. Diana swipes the anxiety pills, and stumbling back, Chuck pulls up his pants. Big Chuck grabs her hips from behind, and they fall backwards onto the bed. Big Chuck spreads his legs in the air and sits up as Diana drops a pill into his cup, then pours two drinks as he twitches drunkenly.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description: He nonchalantly pours the blue liquid of Barbicide disinfectant out of its container and lets the glass vessel fall to the floor with a clatter. Following this casual act, he flips open a metallic Zippo lighter and confidently strikes it against his leg, creating a small flame. Her mouth hangs wide open in shock, and she points across the room to the desk. Later that evening, inside the cozy confines of Sandy's car, Diana sits with a bright smile as she carefully applies her makeup using the mirror. He maintains a forward-facing position, his expression fixed in a stern gaze, and shakes his head slightly. As they make their way into a bustling restaurant, a young waitress with striking red hair warmly greets them before walking away with a pleasant smile on her face. He waves his hand to catch the waitress's attention, and she turns around, visibly startled to lay eyes upon Sandy. She casts a sharp, glaring look at Sandy and departs as his gaze shifts upward. The waitress makes her return, carrying a large mound of food, and she deftly removes her thumb from Sandy's soup with a discreet gesture. As the waitress retreats, Diana eagerly takes a large, satisfying bite of ribs. At a dimly lit motel, they approach the front desk, and she takes her leave. Diana crosses the threshold into The Foxhole, where a husky man with a thick beard, wearing a cowboy hat, notices her entrance. He nods slightly in acknowledgment as Diana leisurely sips her vibrantly green-colored beverage. The man turns his attention away, and she spots his luxurious Mercedes car key and the thick, opulent gold ring adorning his pinky finger. Smiling warmly, the man takes a seat beside her, removes his cowboy hat, and extends his hand, showcasing a striking turquoise bolo tie. They toast each other and swiftly down their shots of liquor. The two of them find a table and sit down, surrounded by several empty shot glasses. As they take another shot, in a sudden burst of energy, Diana slaps the table enthusiastically. Sandy enters the scene, scanning the room until he spots them, and approaches their table with a smile on his face. She gestures toward Chuck and places a comforting hand on his shoulder. Big Chuck nods in understanding, and she leads him confidently to the dance floor. Diana and Big Chuck begin to shimmy to the music, and, with her eyes intently focused on Sandy, Diana provocatively pinches Chuck's nipples through his shirt fabric. As they spin around, Diana bends over, and Big Chuck playfully twirls his cowboy hat behind her, mimicking the motion of riding a bronco. She stands upright, and they continue to dance with her gaze fixed on Sandy, who makes a motion toward the exit door. Now facing Chuck, Diana shimmies in place before suddenly dropping into a dramatic split, bringing her face startlingly close to his crotch. Big Chuck, playing along, points playful finger guns at Sandy as Diana continues to energetically dance on the floor. They proceed to enter a modest motel room where Sandy deposits his wallet on a nearby surface. Chuck steps into Diana's open arms, and Big Chuck swiftly removes his belt, swinging it upward from his crotch like an elephant's trunk and striking Sandy across the face. Chuck delivers a final slap with the belt before letting it fall to the ground. He then aims a mock finger gun at his crotch, unbuttons his pants, and lets them drop. She gives Big Chuck a spanking as he rapidly knocks his knees together. Diana seizes the opportunity to swipe the anxiety pills, and as Chuck stumbles backward, he hurriedly pulls up his pants. Big Chuck firmly grabs hold of her hips from behind, and they tumble backward onto the bed together. Big Chuck spreads his legs upward in the air and sits up while Diana discreetly drops a pill into his cup, then proceeds to pour two drinks as he twitches and sways drunkenly.

As they proceed to make their entrance into a bustling, lively restaurant, they are warmly greeted by a young waitress with strikingly vivid red hair. Casting a sharp, piercing glance at Sandy, she departs as his gaze shifts, momentarily upward. The waitress soon returns, expertly balancing a large mound of food, and with a discreet gesture, she deftly removes her thumb from the edge of Sandy's soup. As the waitress retreats from their table, Diana eagerly takes a large and satisfying bite of succulent ribs.

At a dimly lit and somewhat enigmatic motel, they approach the front desk together, but she takes her leave shortly after. Diana confidently crosses the threshold into The Foxhole, where a husky man, sporting a thick beard and a cowboy hat, takes notice of her entrance. He nods slightly in acknowledgment, and Diana leisurely sips from her vibrantly green-colored beverage. Though he turns his attention away, she spots his luxurious Mercedes car key, along with the thick, opulent gold ring that adorns his pinky finger. Smiling warmly, the man takes a seat beside her, removes his cowboy hat, and extends his hand, showcasing a striking turquoise bolo tie. They toast to each other and swiftly down their shots of strong liquor. The two of them find a table to sit at, surrounding themselves with several empty shot glasses. As they take another shot, Diana, in a sudden burst of energy, enthusiastically slaps the table. Sandy enters the scene, scanning the room with his eyes until he spots them, and approaches their table with a smile on his face. She gestures toward Chuck, placing a comforting hand on his shoulder. Big Chuck nods in understanding, and Diana leads him confidently to the dance floor.

Diana and Big Chuck start to shimmy to the lively music, and with her eyes intently focused on Sandy, Diana provocatively pinches Chuck's nipples through the fabric of his shirt. As they spin around with energetic flair, Diana bends over, and Big Chuck playfully twirls his cowboy hat behind her, mimicking the motion of riding a wild bronco. She stands upright once more, and they continue to dance, her gaze fixed intently on Sandy, who makes a subtle motion toward the exit door. Now facing Chuck, Diana shimmies in place before suddenly dropping into a dramatic split, bringing her face startlingly close to his crotch. Playing along with the scene, Big Chuck points playful finger guns at Sandy as Diana continues to energetically dance on the floor.

They proceed together into a modest motel room where Sandy places his wallet on a nearby surface. Chuck steps into Diana's inviting open arms, and with swift motions, Big Chuck removes his belt, swinging it upward from his crotch like an elephant's trunk, striking Sandy across the face. Chuck delivers a final slap with the belt before letting it fall to the ground. He then aims a mock finger gun at his crotch, humorously unbuttons his pants, and lets them drop. Seizing the moment, she gives Big Chuck a playful spanking as he rapidly knocks his knees together. Diana takes advantage of the opportunity to swipe the anxiety pills, and as Chuck stumbles backward, he hurriedly pulls up his pants. With firm hands, Big Chuck grabs hold of her hips from behind, and they tumble backward onto the bed together. Big Chuck spreads his legs upward in the air and sits up while Diana discreetly drops a pill into his cup, then proceeds to pour two drinks as he twitches and sways, clearly under the influence.

In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. their whispered words carried off by the howling wind. test_cases.name: Object Corruption

She glares at Sandy and leaves as he looks upward. The hostess returns with a tower of sandwiches, and she pulls her finger from Sandy's stew. As the hostess leaves, Diana takes a large bite of wings. In a cabin, they approach the check-in counter, and she leaves. Diana enters The Hideout, where a lanky bearded man in a fedora notices her and nods to himself as Diana sips her blue drink. He turns away, and she notices his Tesla car key and thick silver bracelet on his wrist. The man smiles, sits beside her, removes his fedora, and extends a hand, wearing a leather wristband. They toast and down their martinis. They sit at a table with several empty martini glasses, and as they drink another martini, Diana slaps the table. Sandy enters and scans the room, smiling as he approaches their table. She points at Chuck and places a hand on his shoulder. Big Chuck nods, and she leads him to the dance floor. Diana and Big Chuck jitterbug, and with her eyes on Sandy, Diana pinches Chuck's cheek through his shirt. Spinning around, Diana bends over, and Big Chuck twirls his fedora behind her like swinging a lasso. She stands and they continue dancing with her eyes on Sandy, who motions toward the door. Facing Chuck, Diana shimmies in place and suddenly drops into a split with her face near his knees. Big Chuck points finger guns at Sandy as Diana dances on the floor. test_cases.name: Action Corruption
test_cases.description: He casually spills the Barbicide disinfectant and tosses the glass container across the room, then flicks open a Zippo lighter and brushes it against his arm. Her mouth remains closed, and she gestures toward the window. At night, in Sandy's car, Diana laughs as she brushes her hair. He looks sideways with a playful grin and nods his head. As they exit a restaurant, a young red-haired waitress nods to them, then skips away giggling. He waves at the waitress, and she spins around, surprised to see Sandy. She frowns at Sandy and stays as he glances downward. The waitress arrives with a tray of food, and she flicks her finger at Sandy's soup. As the waitress stays, Diana takes a tiny nibble of ribs. In a motel, they leave the front desk, and she enters. Diana exits The Foxhole, where a husky bearded man in a cowboy hat spots her and winks to himself as Diana twirls her green beverage. He turns toward her, and she inspects his Mercedes car key and thick gold ring on his pinky. The man frowns, stands away from her, puts on his hat, and folds a hand, wearing a turquoise bolo. They clink and sip their shots. They stand by a table with several full shot glasses, and as they sip another shot, Diana taps the table. Sandy exits and surveys the room, frowning as he circles their table. She gestures at Chuck and removes a hand from his shoulder. Big Chuck shakes his head, and she stops him on the dance floor. Diana and Big Chuck waltz, and with her eyes on Sandy, Diana flicks Chuck's ears through his shirt. Twisting around, Diana leaps up, and Big Chuck drops his cowboy hat behind her like tossing a frisbee. She crouches and they halt dancing with her eyes on Sandy, who waves toward the window. Facing Chuck, Diana bobs in place and suddenly floats into a jump with her face by his chest. Big Chuck taps finger guns at Sandy as Diana kneels on the floor. They exit a motel room where Sandy picks up his wallet. Chuck slips out of Diana's arms, and Big Chuck slides off his belt, swaying it up from his knee like a snake’s head and slapping Sandy on the back. Chuck hands him a final belt toss, then grips it. He shakes a finger gun at his knee and ties his shoes, raising them. She hugs Big Chuck as he rapidly claps his hands. Diana grabs the anxiety pills, and stumbling forward, Chuck rolls up his sleeves. Big Chuck pats her back from behind, and they tumble forwards onto the bed. Big Chuck claps his hands in the air and lies down as Diana tosses a pill into his glass, then mixes two drinks as he sings drunkenly.

test_cases.name: Subject-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: The toaster casually pours out the lemonade and drops the notebook on the rug, then flips open a smartphone and strikes it on its armchair. The refrigerator's door hangs open, and it points to the carpet. At night, in the bookshelf's train, the bicycle smiles as it applies glue. The toaster faces forward with a stern gaze and shakes its handle. As they enter a barn, a young blue-haired gardener greets them, then walks away smiling. The toaster signals the gardener, and it turns, shocked to see the bookshelf. It glares at the bookshelf and leaves as the toaster looks upward. The gardener returns with a mound of books, and it pulls its thumb from the bookshelf's magazine. As the gardener leaves, the bicycle takes a large bite of balloons. In a greenhouse, they approach the back wall, and it leaves. The bicycle enters The Toolbox, where a lanky bald man in a fedora notices it and nods to itself as the bicycle sips its purple ink. It turns away, and the bicycle notices its mansion doorbell and slim plastic card on its backpack. The man smiles, sits beside it, removes its beret, and extends a branch, wearing a silver choker. They toast and down their teas. They sit at a counter with several empty mugs, and as they sip another cup, the bicycle slaps the counter. The bookshelf enters and scans the room, smiling as it approaches their counter. It points at the Hammer and places a wheel on its elbow. Big Hammer nods, and it leads it to the racetrack. The bicycle and Big Hammer shimmy, and with its handle on the bookshelf, the bicycle pinches Hammer's shoelaces through its boot. Spinning around, the bicycle bends over, and Big Hammer twirls its scarf behind it like twirling a lasso. It stands and they continue moving with its handle on the bookshelf, which motions toward the passageway. Facing Hammer, the bicycle shimmies in place and suddenly drops into a split with its handle by its knee. Big Hammer points laser pointers at the bookshelf as the bicycle glides on the track. They enter a greenhouse where the bookshelf sets down its suitcase. Hammer walks into the bicycle's branches, and Big Hammer whips off its ribbon, swinging it up from its knee like a cat's tail and hitting the bookshelf in the face. Hammer gives it a final ribbon slap, then drops it. It aims a laser pointer at its knee and unbuttons its jacket, dropping it. The bicycle spanks Big Hammer as it rapidly knocks its toes. The bicycle swipes the confusion marbles, and stumbling back, Hammer pulls up its jacket. Big Hammer grabs its pedals from behind, and they fall backwards onto the carpet. Big Hammer spreads its branches in the air and sits up as the bicycle drops a marble into its saucer, then pours two juices as it twitches giddily.

Big Bob swings his arms in the air and sits up as Olivia slips a tablet into his glass, then fills two cups as he shivers sleepily.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: He empties the Barbicide and drops the container before lighting a Zippo. That night, Diana smiles while applying makeup in Sandy’s car. At a restaurant, they are served by a shocked waitress who reluctantly brings their food. Later, they check into a motel, and Diana enters The Foxhole. A bearded man, Big Chuck, notices her, and they share drinks, with him flaunting his wealth. Sandy joins them, and Diana leads Chuck to the dance floor, keeping an eye on Sandy. They dance provocatively until Sandy motions toward the door. In a motel room, Sandy sets down his wallet, and Big Chuck uses his belt to hit Sandy. Diana takes Sandy's anxiety pills and mixes one into Chuck's drink, who drinks before passing out.

test_cases.name: Reverse Segments Order
test_cases.description: Big Chuck spreads his legs in the air and sits up as Diana drops a pill into his cup then pours two drinks as he twitches drunkenly Big Chuck grabs her hips from behind and they fall backwards onto the bed Chuck pulls up his pants Diana swipes the anxiety pills and stumbling back She spanks Big Chuck as he rapidly knocks his knees He aims a finger gun at his crotch and unbuttons his pants dropping them Chuck gives him a final belt slap then drops it Chuck walks into Diana's arms and Big Chuck whips off his belt swinging it up from his crotch like an elephant's trunk and hitting Sandy in the face They enter a motel room where Sandy sets down his wallet Big Chuck points finger guns at Sandy as Diana dances on the floor Facing Chuck Diana shimmies in place and suddenly drops into a split with her face by his crotch She stands and they continue dancing with her eyes on Sandy who motions toward the door Diana bends over and Big Chuck twirls his cowboy hat behind her like riding a bronco Spinning around Diana pinches Chuck's nipples through his shirt Diana and Big Chuck shimmy and with her eyes on Sandy Big Chuck nods and she leads him to the dance floor She points at Chuck and places a hand on his shoulder Sandy enters and scans the room smiling as he approaches their table They sit at a table with several empty shot glasses and as they drink another shot Diana slaps the table They toast and down their shots The man smiles sits beside her removes his hat and extends a hand wearing a turquoise bolo He turns away and she notices his Mercedes car key and thick gold ring on his pinky Diana enters The Foxhole where a husky bearded man in a cowboy hat notices her and nods to himself as Diana sips her green beverage In a motel they approach the front desk and she leaves As the waitress leaves Diana takes a large bite of ribs The waitress returns with a mound of food and she pulls her thumb from Sandy's soup She glares at Sandy and leaves as he looks upward He signals the waitress and she turns shocked to see Sandy As they enter a restaurant a young redhaired waitress greets them then walks away smiling He faces forward with a stern gaze and shakes his head At night in Sandy's car Diana smiles as she applies makeup Her mouth hangs open and she points to the desk He casually pours out the Barbicide disinfectant and drops the glass container on the floor then flips open a Zippo lighter and strikes it on his leg
